intro: Vandellia ovata, commonly known as the slender vandellia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to South America, particularly Brazil, and is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in tropical gardens.
